programme.title: Aranhas!, (2021, Science fiction)

programme.title: O Jurssico, (2022, Science fiction)

programme.title: Chuva Negra, (1989, Action)

programme.title: Police Story: A Guerra das Drogas, (1985, Action)

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)

programme.title: Era uma vez na China, (1991, Action)

programme.title: Contrato de Risco, (1996, Drama)

programme.title: Os Jovens Pistoleiros, (1988, Western)

programme.title: O Que Fazer?, (2014, Dramedy)

programme.title: Cartman promove o dio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele plida, dizendo que eles no tem alma e no sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajud-lo nesta misso, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: A me do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televiso, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge Csar Millan, um adestrador de ces que aceita o desafio.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evoluo em aula, mesmo que isso v totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lanam o seu novo videogame preferido.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: O diretor PC comea a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle est cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Por uns Dlares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco um astuto caador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, comea uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Rastros de dio, (1956, Western)
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmo e a famlia dele.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendrio esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: O Resgate do Bandoleiro, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Depois de perder seu cavalo em uma aposta, Pat Brennan pega carona em uma diligncia que carregava os recm-casados Willard e Doretta Mims.

programme.title: Da Terra Nascem os Homens, (1966, Western)
programme.desc: Aps a morte de seu marido, Martha e sua filha Hilary decidem seguir o sonho do falecido: popularizar a raa de touros Hereford no Oeste Americano. Elas leiloam seu touro premiado para um fazendeiro ingls no Texas e partem em viagem rumo ao Oeste.

programme.title: Indmita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se v preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caador de peles morre.

programme.title: A Marca da Forca, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Eles o cravaram de balas. Eles o penduraram pelo pescoo. Eles o deixaram para morrer. Mas eles cometeram dois erros fatais: eles tentaram enforcar o homem errado, e no terminaram o trabalho.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na histria real de um escndalo que envolveu presidirios sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para polticos corruptos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivncia, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Incises Perigosas, (2020, Horror)

programme.title: O Trem-Bala, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Uma bomba colocada durante a viagem inaugural do trem-bala mais rpido do mundo e explodir caso a velocidade fique abaixo dos 322Km/h.

programme.title: Intermedirio.com, (2009, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma histria real. O empresrio Jack Harris tem uma linda famlia e uma carreira de sucesso, recuperando empresas problemticas. At que ele conhece Wayne Beering e Buck Dolby, uma dupla que atua com pornografia na internet.

programme.title: A Cura de Todo Mal, (1949, Dramedy)
programme.desc: Johnny um carismtico pregador, que viaja ao lado de sua namorada por todos os Estados Unidos, visitando igrejas e enganando as pessoas ao dizer que possui poderes de cura, at o dia em que ele descobre que os seus poderes so reais.

programme.desc: Aviation and sports come together as a baseball player is recalled to Air Force duty.

programme.title: The Raid: Redemption, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Deep in the heart of Jakarta's slums lies a drug-gangs safe house, home to some of the most terrifying and ruthless fighters in the city. Arriving before dawn, an elite swat team moves in to take down the notorious drug lord that runs it.

programme.title: The Raid 2 (Subtitled), (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Following immediately after the events of THE RAID, Rama (Iko Uwais) is forced to reinvent himself as an undercover cop in order to provide protection for his wife and child.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Reign Of Assassins, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Elusive assassin Drizzle transforms herself into modest shop owner Zeng Jing (Michelle Yeoh) in order to transport the remains of an exalted Buddhist monk to their eternal resting place, but finds her mission unexpectedly complicated.

programme.title: Red Cliff, (2015, Foreign Action & Adventure)
programme.desc: Legendary action cinema master John Woo and international superstar Tony Leung reunite for the first time since the 1992 classic HARD BOILED with this epic historical drama based on a legendary 208 A.D. battle that heralded the Han Dynasty's end.

programme.title: Paradox, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: When his daughter goes missing, a police negotiator (Louis Koo) teams with local police (Tony Jaa) to find her, but instead finds himself embroiled in a web of corruption and violence in this explosive thriller from director Wilson Yip.

programme.title: Kill Zone 2, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: When his cover gets blown, a Hong Kong cop (Wu Jing) lands in a Thai prison where the warden works with a criminal mastermind (Louis Koo) to harvest organs.

programme.title: Rough Night, (2017, Dark Humor & Black Comedies)
programme.desc: Five best friends from college reunite ten years later for a wild weekend getaway in Miami. Their outrageous antics and hard partying result in hilarious unexpected consequences which land them in a seemingly impossible situation to escape.

programme.title: Easy A, (2010, Comedy)
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean cut high school girl (Emma Stone) sees her reputation tarnished until she decides to use the rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

programme.title: The House Bunny, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Shelley gets kicked out of the mansion, she's lost in the wilds of Beverly Hills until she stumbles upon the sorriest sorority on campus. Now it's up to her to spruce up the girls and heat up the Zeta house before the University shuts them down.

programme.title: A League of Their Own, (1992, Comedy)
programme.desc: Jimmy Dugan, a washed-up ballplayer whose big league days are over, is hired to coach in the All-American Girls Baseball League of 1943, while the male pros are at war.

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A flamboyant French Formula One driver aims to dethrone NASCAR superstar Ricky Bobby, whose 'win at all costs' approach has made him a national hero. Now Ricky Bobby must face his own demons and fight Girard for the title of racing's top driver.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians threatens to move the team unless they deliver immediate results. She then fills the roster with has-beens to guarantee their failure. But the team miraculously rallies together and starts to win.

programme.title: Major League II, (1994, Comedy)
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last year's hunger is now replaced with complacency, and bad decisions by the new owner threaten to tear the team apart.

programme.title: Major League: Back to the Minors, (1998, Comedy)

programme.title: Chef, (2014, Comedy)
programme.desc: Chef quits his job in LA after refusing to compromise with its owner, he is left to figure out what's next. He teams up with his ex, a friend & his son to launch a food truck reigniting his passion for the kitchen and zest for life.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars as a novice art history professor with a surprising lesson plan that inspires her students to open their eyes to love and life.

programme.title: The Mexican, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A man tries to transport an ancient gun called The Mexican, believed to carry a curse, back across the border, while his girlfriend pressures him to give up his criminal ways.

programme.title: Rachel Getting Married, (2008, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: When Kym, returns to the Buchman family home for the wedding of her sister Rachel, she brings a long history of personal crises, family conflict, and tragedy along with her. Rated -R

programme.title: Failure to Launch, (2006, Comedy)

programme.title: Witness, (1985, Action)

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)

programme.desc: In 2028, Los Angeles is in the midst of the most violent riot in its history. Four bank robbers botch a heist and head to the Hotel Artemis, a penthouse and an ER that exclusively serves criminals all of whom now set their sights on the robbers.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Want someone to infiltrate a top-secret organization or steal a scientific formula that could change the world? For the right price, The Saint is your man.

programme.title: The Saint, (1997, Thriller)

programme.title: Needle In A Timestack, (2021, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A devoted husband will stop at nothing to save his marriage, after it gets destroyed by a time traveling rival. Based on a short story written by Robert Silverberg.

programme.title: Predestination, (2014, Thriller)

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Flight, (2012, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Airline pilot Whip Whitaker miraculously lands his plane after a mid-air catastrophe but questions arise as to who or what was really at fault.

programme.title: Passengers, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13

programme.title: The Fugitive Kind, (1960, Drama)
programme.desc: In this Tennessee Williams masterpiece, Marlon Brando is superb as a paradoxical drifter drawn into the desperate lives of two passionate women, Maureen Stapleton and Joanne Woodward, in a small Mississippi town.

programme.title: True Grit, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Young Guns, (1988, Western)

programme.title: Young Guns II, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: The West has changed since The Regulators last rode through. Cornered by the ruthless cattle kings and double-crossed by corrupt government officials, Billy the Kid leads the Regulators down a treacherous trail towards Old Mexico and destiny.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Quigley Down Under, (1990, Western)
programme.desc: A self-assured American sharpshooter moves to Australia in search of employment and finds work for a despotic land baron in the Australian outback.

programme.title: Of Mice and Men, (1992, Drama)

programme.title: Heaven's Gate, (1981, Western)

programme.title: Twilight, (2008, Drama)

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse, (2010, Drama)

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1, (2011, Drama)

programme.title: Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2, (2012, Drama)

programme.title: Tomb Raider, (2018, Adventure)
programme.desc: Armed with only her sharp mind, blind faith and stubborn spirit, young Lara Croft pushes past her limits on her very first perilous adventure into the unknown. If she survives, it could be the making of herearning her the name tomb raider.

programme.title: Sahara, (2005, Adventure)
programme.desc: Two thrill-seeking adventurers cross paths with a beautiful doctor and they find themselves on the ultimate hunt for a treasure that claims all who seek it.

programme.title: The Host, (2013, Science fiction)
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over humans' bodies and erasing their minds, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about most, proving that love can conquer all in a dangerous new world.

programme.title: The Aviator, (2004, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: The early years of larger-than-life American figure Howard Hughes are captured by legendary director Martin Scorsese, in this acclaimed Oscar-winning biopic starring Leonardo DiCaprio and Cate Blanchett.

programme.title: Mrs. Doubtfire, (1993, Screwball)
programme.desc: An eccentric dad dresses as a British nanny so he can care for his kids at the home of their mother.

programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Oscar-nominee Kate Winslet light up the screen as Jack and Rose, the young lovers who find one another on the maiden voyage of the "unsinkable" R.M.S. Titanic.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie, (1995, Comedy)
programme.desc: Mike and Carol have just one week to come up with $20,000 in back taxes, or theyll lose their house to a neighbor. Even worse, Marcia gets a swollen nose on date night, Cindys addicted to tattling, and Jans hearing a psychotic inner voice.

programme.title: Evolution, (2001, Science fiction)

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)

programme.title: Wild Things, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Kevin Bacon, Matt Dillon and Neve Campbell star in a steamy story of murder, intrigue and sex. Rated: R

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Juice, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Q. Raheem. Bishop. Steel. They're four Harlem friends who spend their days hanging out and looking for a way to get the power and respect they call Juice. Q hopes to earn respect by becoming a scratch 'n' mix DJ.

programme.title: The Gentlemen, (2020, Drama)
programme.desc: A British drug lord tries to sell off his highly profitable empire to a dynasty of Oklahoma billionaires.

programme.title: The Firm, (1993, Thriller)
programme.desc: Mitch joins a prosperous Memphis firm that affords Mitch and his wife an affluent lifestyle beyond their wildest dreams. But when FBI agents confront him with evidence of corruption and murder within the firm, Mitch sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Taxi Driver, (1976, Crime)
programme.desc: Paul Schrader's gritty screenplay depicts the ever-deepening alienation of Vietnam Veteran Travis Bickle (Robert De Niro in a tour de force performance), a psychotic cab driver who obsessively cruises the mean streets of Manhattan.

programme.title: Layer Cake, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Proud Mary, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is Mary, a hit woman working for an organized crime family in Boston, whose life is completely turned around when she meets a young boy whose path she crosses when a professional hit goes bad.

programme.desc: Q. Raheem. Bishop. Steel. They're four Harlem friends who spend their days hanging out and looking for a way to get the power and respect they call Juice. Q hopes to earn respect by becoming a scratch 'n' mix DJ.

programme.desc: Parry, a homeless history professor, lives in a fantasy world full of castles, Red Knights and damsels in distress. Bridges co-stars as Jack, New York's #1 shock deejay, whose off-hand arrogance triggers a tragedy which ruins his career. Rated: R

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Vertical Limit, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An emotionally-charged action-adventure tale of a retired climber (O'Donnell) who must launch a treacherous and extraordinary rescue effort up K2, the world's second-highest peak, to save his estranged sister and her summit team in a race against time.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: Rollerball, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jonathan Cross (Chris Klein) is an all-American hotshot, the most popular player in the fastest and most extreme sport of all time: Rollerball.

programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: John Grisham's The Rainmaker, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Matt Damon plays Rudy Baylor, a rookie lawyer in over his head on a high-profile case. Opposing him: an army of legal sharks. On Rudys side: Deck Shifflet, a feisty paralawyer who specializes in flunking the bar exam.

programme.title: Bringing Out the Dead, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: Frank Pierce, a paramedic, is on the brink of madness from too many years of saving and losing lives. One fateful night, Frank meets Mary Burke, the daughter of a man Frank tried to save. Together, Frank and Mary confront the ghosts of the past.

programme.title: The Godfather, (1972, Crime)
programme.desc: A chilling portrait of the Corleone family's rise and near fall from power in America along with balancing the story of the Sicilian clan's ugly crime business in which they are engaged.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: The Godfather Part II, (1974, Crime)
programme.desc: The continuing saga of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in New York during the 1910s and then following Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he tries to expand the family business.

programme.title: Bobbie Jo And The Outlaw, (1976, Thriller)
programme.desc: A stunning carhop who wants to be a country singer and her sweetheart who dreams he's Billy the Kid become involved in robbery and murder.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the critical Battle City showdown with the fate of the world at stake: Yami Yugi vs. Marik! If Yami Yugi loses, Yugi is taking a permanent vacation into the Shadow Realm!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik proves his The Winged Dragon of Ra is the strongest Egyptian God Card by destroying Slifer the Sky Dragon! None of Yugi's cards can withstand its assault, but a gift from Kaiba may turn the duel around

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi can't strike Marik's life points, and with every turn that passes, Marik is one step closer to taking down Yugi with a final strike from The Winged Dragon of Ra...

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Yugi at the end of his ropes and the maniacal Marik waging all-out war, can Marik's oldest friend reach Marik in time to help him come to his senses before his insanity overwhelms him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Will the combined force of all of Yugi's monsters be enough to defeat an Egyptian God that terminated two other powerful Egyptian Gods? The fate of the world hangs in the balance with the finale of the Battle City Tournament!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: KaibaCorp Island is set to explode in mere minutes, but the blimp's engines are offline! Can Yugi and friends escape from the island in time, or will they sink to the bottom of the sea?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta and Serenity tour around the Town of Domino and reminisce about their friends' battles during Battle City, they learn how much they've grown and far they've come... and how far they have left to go!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian God Cards are stolen! A terrifying new villain emerges! Real monsters begin to appear around the world! Can Yugi and the gang discover how these strange events are connected before the planet is destroyed?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With Seal of Orichalcos, not only can Gurimo have ten monsters at once, but each creature receives a power boost from Orichalcos's malevolent energies! Yugi better find a way to protect himself against Gurimo's horde!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only is our world on the brink of apocalypse, but an entire domain of monsters is also on the verge of collapse! Both Earth and the monster domain must unite and fight against the largest terror they have ever faced!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the gang set off on a cross-country trek when they're asked for help from a one-eyed former foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba returns to Duelist Kingdom for a showdown against Pegasus! Will Kaiba discover the secret behind Pegasus's strategies before he loses his soul, just like he did on his first trip to Duelist Kingdom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Not only does Alister's fiend gain attack points for every fiery monster on the field, but it can also take control of Kaiba's monsters! Will Alister get his revenge, or will Kaiba get aid from the monster domain?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai's back to help Yugi take down Dartz and save the world from annihilation... or is a topsy-turvy twist in the works?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai has joined the enemy! Is she brainwashed, or is there some deeper reason for her unexpected transformation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Taking advantage of the Seal of Orichalcos, Mai coordinates her Harpie Ladies to whittle Joey's forces into waste! Is this the last we'll see of him, or will a legendary guardian recognize Joey as a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the potent powers of Claw of Hermos, Joey transforms Time Wizard into an almighty... hammer? Can Joey master the uncanny abilities of his new card to pound Mai's Harpie Ladies before they slash him to shreds?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Professor Hawkins has discovered startling connections between the world's conundrums, the Orichalcos stones and an ancient lost civilization.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a Wild West showdown between Yugi and his fiercest challenge yet: Rafael and his guardian monsters.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi calls on the legendary strength of Timaeus, but when it's not enough to crack Rafael's defense, will Yugi resort to desperate measures and go against everything he believes in to make the riskiest move of his life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Using the abilities of Seal of Orichalcos, Yugi grinds Rafael's guardians, but he's also succumbing to the card's evil influence. As darkness grows within his heart, the consequences of his non-heroic acts may be his undoing.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has captured Yugi's soul! Broken and unmotivated, how will our heroes ever rescue Yugi, especially when Dartz has a duo of nefarious new recruits ready to eradicate them?

programme.title: Luffy's bone-crushing battle with the Vice Warden of Impel Down is interrupted by the sudden appearance of Blackbeard. When the rubber-man hears what the warlord has to say heads will roll!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: REFUSAL TO BE DEFEATED! SERIOUS HANNYABAL

programme.title: Even in Second Gear, Luffy is no match for Blackbeard's vortex, but the rubber-man rebounds by knocking out a Demon Guard with one ferocious pistol-punch. Elsewhere, Warden Magellan vows to finish Luffy once and for all!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: JET PISTOL OF ANGER! LUFFY VS. BLACKBEARD!

programme.title: Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan's toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy's neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden's Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STOP MAGELLAN! IVA'S ESOTERIC TECHNIQUE EXPLODES!

programme.title: Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MAGELLAN'S TRICKY MOVE! A FOILED ESCAPE PLAN!

programme.title: Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don't return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won't survive long enough to save Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ESCAPEE TEAM IN TROUBLE! THE FORBIDDEN MOVE: VENOM DEMON!

programme.title: Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they're not out of hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: COME, FINAL MIRACLE! BREAK THROUGH THE GATE OF JUSTICE!

programme.title: Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy's reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO THE NAVY HEADQUARTERS! OFF TO RESCUE ACE!

programme.title: While Luffy continues his rescue mission, Nami learns a lesson about how to turn rain into cash, and Franky wakes up in a freezing forest full of ferocious cyborg animals!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE WEATHERIA REPORT AND THE CYBORG ANIMALS!

programme.title: Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE CHICK OF A GIANT BIRD AND A PINK SHOWDOWN!

programme.title: Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! REVOLUTIONARIES AND THE GORGING FOREST'S TRAP!

programme.title: Zoro's attempt to reunite with his friends leads him to a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A HUGE TOMB AND THE PANTY DEBT!

programme.title: While the marines prepare for Ace's execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL RETROSPECTIVE BEFORE MARINEFORD! THE VOW OF THE BROTHERHOOD!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL RETROSPECTIVE BEFORE MARINEFORD! THE THREE NAVY ADMIRALS COME TOGETHER!

programme.title: Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man's father is shockingly revealed!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TICKING DOWN TO THE TIME OF BATTLE! THE NAVY'S STRONGEST LINEUP IN POSITION!

programme.title: Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace's mother in order save his life and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes an unexpected entrance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A VAST FLEET APPEARS! HERE COME THE WHITEBEARD PIRATES!

programme.title: As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE WAR! ACE AND WHITEBEARD'S PAST!

programme.title: Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FORCE THAT COULD DESTROY THE WORLD! THE POWER OF THE TREMOR-TREMOR FRUIT!

programme.title: Fire meets ice as mythical warriors, erupting admirals, legendary pirates, and a giant giant go head to head in the biggest, baddest battle of all time! There's only one thing missing: Monkey D. Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN ALL-CONSUMING INFERNO!! ADMIRAL AKAINU'S POWER!

programme.title: A towering giant of a giant known as Little Oars Jr. carves a path of death and destruction as he fights to save Ace. The monstrous mauler is within arm's reach of his friend when he's intercepted by the seven warlords of the sea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DESCENDANT OF THE BEAST! LITTLE OARS JR. FULL SPEED AHEAD!

programme.title: In the wake of Little Oars Junior's tragic defeat, Admiral Sengoku hatches a devious plan to speed up the countdown to Ace's execution. The situation looks beyond bleak until a hero enters the fray from on high!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: JUSTICE FOR THE WINNERS! SENGOKU'S STRATEGY IN ACTION!

programme.title: Luffy appears on the field of battle with a ferocious sense of urgency. Ace could be executed at any minute, and the rubber-man's refusal to back down impresses even the most feared men in all the world!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: STRAW HAT TEAM ARRIVES! TENSION GROWS AT THE BATTLEFIELD

programme.title: Luffy leaps into action, attacking the Naval forces with a frantic display of brutality. Meanwhile, Ace watches in horror as an army of zombies rises up to attack his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVEN IF IT MEANS DEATH! LUFFY VS. THE NAVY; THE BATTLE STARTS!

programme.title: Supernatural powers take center stage in the battle to save Ace as Luffy and his uniquely talented allies throw down with the Navy's own arsenal of Devil Fruit Eaters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HARD BATTLES, ONE AFTER ANOTHER! DEVIL FRUIT EATERS VS. DEVIL FRUIT EATERS!

programme.title: A gift from Boa Hancock and Ivan-san's Galaxy Wink get Luffy closer to Ace than ever, but a sword-wielding foe from the past threatens to derail the rescue mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KUMA'S TRANSFORMATION! IVA'S BLOW OF ANGER!

programme.title: Luffy runs into a lethal roadblock in the form of Hawk-Eye Mihawk. The legendary swordsman is determined to halt Luffy's onslaught, but Ivan-san, Boa Hancock, and Jimbei aren't ready to give up the fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SWORDSMAN MIHAWK! LUFFY COMES UNDER THE ATTACK OF THE BLACK SWORD!

programme.title: Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE EXTERMINATION STRATEGY IN ACTION! THE POWER OF THE PACIFISTAS!

programme.title: Whitebeard is betrayed and brutally stabbed by one of his own men! In the wake of this unthinkable act of treason, allegations about the legendary pirate bring the battle to a halt!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy's defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE ENCIRCLING WALLS ACTIVATED! THE WHITEBEARD PIRATES BACKED INTO A CORNER!

programme.title: With the ice melting beneath his feet, Luffy begins a desperate final charge towards his soon-to-be-executed brother. Should his rescue attempt fail, death will surely embrace them both!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXECUTION ORDER ISSUED! BREAK THROUGH THE ENCIRCLING WALLS!

programme.title: Crocodile's unexpected assistance creates an opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: MOVING INTO THE FINAL PHASE! WHITEBEARD'S TRUMP CARD FOR RECOVERY!

programme.title: The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LUFFY AT THE END OF HIS TETHER! AN ALL-OUT BATTLE AT THE ORIS PLAZA!

programme.title: While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a troubled youth seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE POWER THAT WILL SHORTEN ONE'S LIFE! ENERGY HORMONE, REDUX!

programme.title: Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner's swords hovering above Ace's head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: TO LIVE UP TO A PROMISE! LUFFY AND COBY COLLIDE!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #6 Dragon of Doom
programme.desc: On the bottom of the ocean, within the sunken Titanic, the golden dragon statue waits. When Lupin and the gang are hired to retrieve it, Goemon recognizes the dragon as one of his clan's treasures. Now, he's ready to fight his own friends to protect it!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #7 The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
programme.desc: To retrieve the Harimao's Treasure, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #8 The Secret of Twilight Gemini
programme.desc: As Lupin's mentor Don Dolune lies on his deathbed, he hands the master thief a gift: the diamond named Twilight. But it's only half of the treasure-the other half of the Twilight can be found in Morocco

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Notorious gangster, Al Capone left behind five tiles that reveal the location of his massive gold hoard when put together. Out of the five tiles, Lupin and Fujiko have three in their possession.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata concocts an extravagant plan to finally capture Lupin by luring him in with a fake meteor made from 6 tons of pure gold. Low and behold, his plan backfires and Lupin and his gang make off with the meteor.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin sneaks into an old castle to steal a collection of priceless angel paintings, owned by the late Malcolm Hurst. Inside the castle, Lupin meets a mysterious girl named Flora, who knows the whereabouts of the angel paintings.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are out at sea attempting to retrieve the gold inside a sunken pirate ship. However, a female pirate gang interrupts their retrieval mission and both parties leave empty-handed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in South Africa to receive a nautical chart from a retired Nazi that shows the location of a sunken Nazi treasure. However, two young German soldiers interrupt the exchange and a skirmish ensues.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in the small city of San Pico in Central America. However, the city was in the midst of a war between the Government Forces and the Guerilla Army. Leading the Guerilla Army is Jigen's old army pal, Giranco.
programme.sub-title: Here Comes Lupin in a Tank

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Unsurprisingly, Fujiko had once betrayed her heist partner Garb, known as the Grim Reaper, and left him for dead. Garb, who has seemingly returned from the dead, is determined to kill Fujiko and has an uncanny ability to dodge bullets with ease.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious cult that idolizes a solid gold Virgin Mary statue abducts Fujiko and they're planning to burn her at the stake as a witch. However, her kidnapper and the cult leader look vaguely familiar to Lupin. Have they crossed paths before?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has a horrible case of athlete's foot and visits Dr. Budweiser, who is also a cloning expert, for treatment. The doctor takes a sample of Lupin's skin under the guise of treating his Athlete's foot, but the doctor has another plan up his sleeve.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious message appears in the newspaper and Lupin takes it as a sign from this late grandfather, Lupin I, to reclaim his diamond keepsake.
programme.sub-title: A Treasure That Smells Like a Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal the Dracula Heart Ruby from a mysterious woman known as Mother. The Dracula Heart Ruby is known to bleed once every century and whoever drinks its blood maintains their youth for another 100 years.
programme.sub-title: The Ruby Sheds Tears of Blood

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin steals a painting of Lupin I's beloved from Baltan Gallery in Paris. However, the painting turns out to be a forgery and Lupin has a clue as to who is painting the forgeries. With his daughter Sophie held hostage.
programme.sub-title: The Prisoner Inside the Baltan Manor

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko attend a lavish party full of wealthy women in order to steal their jewelry. However, the castle tower where the party was being held turns out to be a rocket ship. The hijacked rocket transports the party and guests to a small island.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mrs. Alda, a wealthy heiress is kidnapped and Lupin shows up to claim the ransom money. However, the real mastermind behind the kidnapping is Mrs. Alda herself. After she gets the ransom money, she erases Lupin's memory and frames him for the crime.
programme.sub-title: Care to Play a Kidnapping Game?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaskas population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husbands murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: World War Z, (2013, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: World War Z is the fast-paced, pulse-pounding epic of the potential last days of the human race. Former United Nations employee Gerry Lane (Brad Pitt) is called in to help stop the pandemic that has spread around the world.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow, (1999, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Johnny Depp is Ichabod Crane, an investigator determined to stop the murderous Headless Horseman.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel, (2020, Horror)
programme.desc: A long time ago in a distant fairytale countryside, a young girl (Sophia Lillis) leads her little brother (newcomer Samuel J. Leakey) into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

programme.title: Sin City: A Dame To Kill For, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: Some of Sin City's most hard-boiled citizens cross paths with a few of its more reviled inhabitants.

programme.title: Snowpiercer, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: After a failed global-warming experiment, a post-apocalyptic Ice Age has killed off nearly all life on the planet.

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: An epic set against the breathtaking landscapes of ancient China, Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon combines the exhilarating martial arts choreography by Yuen Wo-Ping with the sensitivity and classical storytelling of an Ang Lee film.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: The Iron Sheriff, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: Sterling Hayden plays a sheriff with continuing moral dilemmas. Should he relate a deathbed confession which falsely implicates his son in a murder? Should he carry out his threat to cold-bloodedly kill the real murderer or bring him to legal justice?

programme.title: Five Guns To Tombstone, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: A reformed outlaw is living a clean life until his no-good brother who just escaped from prison ropes him into pulling a robbery. Now Billy has his own plan...to prevent it. And all he needs is his six shooters and a little luck.

programme.title: The Halliday Brand, (1957, Western)
programme.desc: A western about a young man's (Joseph Cotten) disillusionment with his father (Ward Bond), a corrupt sheriff. When his dad turns away from the lynching of his sister's lover, the boy rebels and his father declares him an 'outlaw.'

programme.title: Hondo, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne plays Hondo Lane, a cavalry rider who becomes the protector of Angie Lowe as well as a father figure to her boy, Johnny. Angie, determinedly awaiting the return of her husband, refuses to leave their homestead despite the growing danger.

programme.title: Big Jake, (1971, Western)
programme.desc: An aging Texas cattle man who has outlived his time swings into action when outlaws kidnap his grandson and wound his son.

programme.title: McLintock!, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: The cattle rancher McLintock (John Wayne) puts his brand on the territory and every woman in it! Louise Warren plays a widow who moves with her two children onto McLintocks ranch to serve as cook, while Maureen OHara plays the estranged wife.

programme.title: Along Came Jones, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: Gary Cooper gives a marvelous, tongue-in-cheek performance as a fumble-fingered cowpoke who is mistaken for a notorious bandit and almost gets killed by both sides of the law...all while managing to capture the attention of Loretta Young.

programme.title: King of the Cowboys, (1943, Western)
programme.desc: Saboteurs are blowing up government warehouses (during World War II). Roy and his pals work undercover to put an end to their operations.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine might in fact have hidden gold deposits. Leave it to Roy to find out the truth!

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Western)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin', (2005, Musical)
programme.desc: Following a near-fatal gun battle, Marcus recalls his journey from orphaned street kid from the Bronx to making his mark in the drug trade to teaming up with a fellow ex-con (Terrence Howard) for his shot at becoming a successful rap artist.

programme.title: Changing Lanes, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: Late for court, an attorney weaves in and out of traffic. In a different lane, a father whose right to see his children rests on getting to court on time. A minor accident will turn these two strangers into beasts.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: Flags of Our Fathers, (2006, War Drama)
programme.desc: From Academy Award-winning director Clint Eastwood and Academy Award-winner Steven Spielberg, comes the life stories of the six men who raised the flag at The Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in WWII.

programme.title: Basic, (2003, Thriller)
programme.desc: A former Army Ranger, now working as a DEA agent, is called in to investigate the disappearance of a drill sergeant and several cadets during a training mission that went disastrously wrong in the Panamanian jungle.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement, (2000, Military & War Action)
programme.desc: Colonel Terry Childers is a patriot and war hero. But when a peacekeeping mission he leads in Yemen goes terribly wrong, he finds himself facing a court-martial.

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato
programme.desc: Damien e Leito esto retornando ao Distrito 13 em uma misso para levar a paz ao setor controlado por cinco lderes de gangues diferentes, antes que os servios secretos da cidade tomem medidas drsticas para resolver o problema.

programme.title: Ameaa Explosiva
programme.desc: Depois de uma ameaa de bomba, dois especialistas do FBI mergulham em um jogo mortal de gato e rato com um criminoso, correndo desesperadamente contra o tempo para descobrir o verdadeiro objetivo do homem-bomba, enquanto lutam para salvar sua cidade.

programme.title: Revlver

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingana Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experincias. Ao visitar sua famlia ele descobre que sua filha est casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Everly
programme.desc: Uma mulher desesperada, presa em seu apartamento, deve se defender de dezenas de assassinos enviados por seu implacvel ex, um nefasto chefo do trfico.

programme.title: Redeno
programme.desc: Jason Statham um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grvida.

programme.title: Halloween III: A Noite das Bruxas
programme.desc: Um malvado fabricante de brinquedos planeja vender milhes de mscaras que mataro todas as crianas que as usarem no Halloween.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 4
programme.desc: Jigsaw e sua aprendiz Amanda morreram. Depois de ficarem sabendo do homicdio do Detetive Kerry, dois agentes veteranos do FBI, Agente Strahm e Agente Perez, auxiliam o Detetive Hoffman a organizar os restos do ltimo jogo de Jigsaw.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 5
programme.desc: No quinto captulo da franquia Jogos Mortais, o Detetive Hoffman parece ser a ltima pessoa viva a continuar o legado do Jigsaw. Mas quando o seu segredo ameaado, Hoffman precisa ir caa para eliminar todos os assuntos inacabados.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Bem-Vindo a Raccoon City
programme.desc: Esta histria de origem, ambientada em 1998, explora os segredos da misteriosa Manso Spencer e da malfadada Raccoon City.

programme.title: O Espelho
programme.desc: Uma mulher tenta exonerar seu irmo, condenado por assassinato, provando que o crime foi cometido por um fenmeno sobrenatural.

programme.title: Jogos Mortais 3
programme.desc: Ao lado de sua nova aprendiz Amanda,o manipulador por trs dos jogos cruis e complexos, que aterrorizaram uma comunidade e chocaram a polcia, mais uma vez escapa de ser capturado e desaparece.

programme.title: Segredos de um Crime
programme.desc: Um rapper suspeito do assassinato de uma jovem.A advogada dele no acredita nisso.Ela aceitou o caso ao descobrir que enfrentaria um promotor ambicioso.Seu futuro depende de ver o caso ser concludo rapidamente e em sigilo.

programme.title: A Face Oculta da Lei
programme.desc: A investigao de um roubo com homicdio desencadeia uma srie de eventos que faro com que um policial corrupto do LAPD questione suas tticas.

programme.title: Aposta Mxima
programme.desc: Estudante acredita que foi enganado e vai Costa Rica enfrentar magnata.

programme.title: Infidelidade
programme.desc: Um encontro secreto. Um homem trai sua esposa. Uma mulher trai o marido. E ento tudo comea a dar errado rapidamente.

programme.title: Instinto Predador
programme.desc: Frank capturou animais selvagens na selva brasileira, incluindo uma ona branca de 400 libras. Ele a envia no mesmo navio que um assassino preso. O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais.

programme.title: Estranho, Mas Verdade
programme.desc: Uma mulher surpreende a famlia de seu falecido namorado, dizendo-lhes que est grvida de seu filho.

programme.title: Megalodon
programme.desc: Uma embarcao militar em busca de um submersvel no identificado encontra-se cara a cara com um tubaro gigante, forado a usar apenas o que tem a bordo para se defender da besta monstruosa.

programme.title: Planeta dos Tubares
programme.desc: Em um futuro prximo, o derretimento glacial cobrir 98% da massa terrestre. Tubares floresceram e agora dominam o planeta, operando como uma enorme escola liderada por um tubaro alfa mutante.

programme.title: A Invaso
programme.desc: Depois que sua pequena cidade australiana aniquilada por um ataque areo avassalador, um grupo de civis foge da captura e descobre que agora esto entre os ltimos sobreviventes de uma invaso extraterrestre que engolfou todo o planeta.

programme.title: Tubares de Gelo
programme.desc: Uma nova raa de tubares vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estao de pesquisa do rtico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: O Som do Trovo
programme.desc: No ano de 2055, o esporte predileto dos ricos viajar no tempo para caar dinossauros. A diverso tem apenas uma regra: proibido trazer do passado qualquer lembrancinha, viva ou morta, j que isto geraria uma srie de reaes que modificaria o presente

programme.title: Voo 7500
programme.desc: Um voo sai dos Estados Unidos para o Japo, durante as dez horas de voo os passageiros pensam em como se distrair ... at perceberem uma presena estranha e sobrenatural dentro do avio.

programme.title: O Matador - Misso Resgate
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele est cuidando sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Risco Absoluto
programme.desc: Liberado aps seis anos preso por um crime que no cometeu, Shane Daniels no demora a se meter novamente em encrenca. Ele testemunha um crime e para salvar uma jovem sequestrada se envolve com a mfia chinesa, russos e policiais corruptos.

programme.title: Crimes de Rua
programme.desc: Dois policiais, um com uma arma e outro com os punhos, arriscam tudo para tornar o bairro livre de crimes e drogas, derrubando o mais poderoso chefo das ruas

programme.title: Evidncias de um Crime
programme.desc: Aps a morte de sua esposa, um policial abandona a profisso para cuidar da filha. Ele trabalha limpando cenas de crime, mas uma terefa rotineira acaba ameaando a vida estvel que construiu para a famlia.

programme.title: O Sequestro

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E7

programme.title: Enquanto Tyson, Kai, Max, Kenny e Ray voam para Hong Kong para se preparar para o torneio asitico, Kai "sai" do time e caminha pelas ruas. O resto da equipe tenta segui-lo e falha quando ouvem um Bey girando.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E8

programme.title: Kevin discorda dos BladeBreakers especialmente Ray e desafia Ray para uma batalha. Tyson j teve o suficiente e luta com Kevin, mas ele cai rapidamente na capacidade do Bey de balanar e se multiplicar.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E9

programme.title: O Torneio Asitico BBA est em andamento, no auge de uma torre inacreditavelmente alta na China. Os BladeBreakers e os White Tigers percebem que acabaro lutando entre si, e usam isso um contra o outro.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E10

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E11

programme.title: Ray deixa os BladeBreakers e viaja para as montanhas para tentar recuperar Driger. Mariah o encontra, bate em batalha, confronta-o com sua estupidez e pede que ele volte para os Tigres Brancos.
programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E12

programme.title: a manh das meias-finais do Asian Beyblade Tournament e Tyson consegue dormir. O resto do time sai cedo, mas Ray fica para trs para garantir que Tyson acorde.

programme.desc: Beyblade - S1E19

programme.title: De volta ao presente, Agome est relaxando em casa quando Inuyasha vem procur-la, e ela retorna com ele ao passado para encontrar Yura.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E4

programme.title: O meio irmo de Inuyasha, Sesshomaru, aparece procurando pelo tmulo de seu pai que era um youkai-cachorro. Agome aprende sobre o passado de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E5

programme.title: Apesar da ajuda de Agome em frustr-lo, Sesshomaru descobre a localizao do tmulo do pai de Inuyasha, que contm uma espada que ele deseja.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E6

programme.title: Agome capaz de puxar a espada Tessaiga para fora do altar, e Sesshomaru tenta mat-la, irritando Inuyasha e provocando um duelo de irmos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E7

programme.title: Inuyasha e Agome encontram um jovem samurai chamado Nobunaga cujo senhor foi possudo por um youkai Sapo, e eles partiram para resgatar uma princesa.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E8

programme.title: Em sua jornada, Inuyasha e Agome encontram Shippo, um jovem youkai raposa que rouba um pedao da Jia para vingar seu pai assassinado.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E9

programme.title: Inuyasha duela com Hiten enquanto Shippo tenta usar sua magia para resgatar Agome de Manten, mas os Irmos Relmpago no sero derrotados to facilmente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E10

programme.title: Quando Agome retorna ao presente, o poder da Jia de Quatro Almas incita uma antiga mscara de noh para atacar seu av.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E11

programme.title: Inuyasha v um youkai chamado Tatarimokke que guia benevolentemente os espritos das crianas, enquanto Agome encontra o esprito de uma garota chamada Mayu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E12

programme.title: Depois que Inuyasha e Agome resgatam uma garota chamada Nazuna, eles passam a noite juntos em um santurio e aprendem mais sobre a transformao de Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E13

programme.title: Inuyasha e os outros encontram a Feiticeira Urasue, que rouba o tmulo de Kikyo, a sacerdotisa que selou Inuyasha. Ele est determinado a impedi-l.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E14

programme.title: Para trazer Kikyo de volta vida, Urasue sequestra Agome. Quando Kikyo revivida, ela imediatamente tenta matar Inuyasha com raiva.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E15

programme.title: Mirok, um jovem monge mulherengo, coleciona fragmentos da Jia de Quatro Almas. Quando ele rouba a de Agome, Inuyasha o segue para recuper-los.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E16

programme.title: Um artista chamado Kotatsu sonha em controlar um exrcito de youkais, alimentado por um fragmento da Jia de Quatro Almas. Cabe a Inuyasha e os outros par-lo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E17

programme.title: Narak d a Sesshomaru um brao humano com um fragmento de Jia embutido, para que Sesshomaru possa tentar recuperar a posse de Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E18

programme.title: Agome ferida durante a luta de Inuyasha com Sesshomaru, e quando Inuyasha descobre o plano de Narak, ele teme por sua vida.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E19

programme.title: Kaede leva Inuyasha e Mirok para uma caverna nas proximidades e conta sobre o seu passado com Kikyo. Enquanto isso, Agome tenta se reajustar sua vida normal.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E20

programme.title: A luta de Inuyasha com Royakan continua. Agome interrompe seu encontro com Hojo para retornar ao santurio, onde ela sente a presena da Jia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E21

programme.title: Kikyo aparentemente ressuscitou e est vivendo como uma sacerdotisa da aldeia. Um monge errante percebe que nem tudo como parece com ela.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E22

programme.title: Inuyasha procura por Kikyo, mas Agome a encontra primeiro. Kikyo a leva prisioneira e no escuta suas tentativas de explicar o que realmente aconteceu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - S1E23
